name: Basil Pesto
author: Bwoogie1
summary: Basil pesto is extremely versatile! It enhances the flavor for all dishes like steak, chicken, fish, vegetables, and pasta! After the ingredients are combined and formed into a tube shape, simply slice whatever size portion you need and freeze the rest! Easy-breezy to prepare and bursting with flavor!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine basil, Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, and olive oil in a food processor
Add garlic, pine nuts, salt, and pepper
Pulse until mixture becomes smooth and blended
Pour mixture onto a large sheet of plastic wrap; roll into a tube shape and seal
Store in the refrigerator until needed
